description: This file defines a state management store for a Ludo game using the Zustand library. It includes the initial game state, and functions to reset the game, set the room and dice, append logs, cycle turns, and move pieces, facilitating the game logic and UI rendering.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game state to initial values, optionally specifying the game mode ('solo' or 'multiplayer').

methods.name: setRoom
methods.description: Sets the current game room ID and mode.

methods.name: setDice
methods.description: Sets the current value of the dice.

methods.name: appendLog
methods.description: Appends a message to the game log.

methods.name: nextTurn
methods.description: Advances the turn to the next player in sequence.

methods.name: movePiece
methods.description: Moves a specified piece of a player forward by a certain number of steps, updating its position.
